outline:
EAP039-1-3-1
10 Ggt01.001 ka 1b1-124a7 chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po sarba d+harma ma hA san d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta ku la ya rA dza
1100 Ggt01.002 ka 124ab1-137a3 la zlo gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
1129 Ggt01.003 ka 137a3-163a7
byang chub kyi sems shes bya mtha' gcod kyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so
13 Ggt01.004 ka 163b1-227b4 chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub sems su 'dus pa'i mdo sarba d+harmaHsan+d+hi ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta sU tra
xxx Ggt01.005 ka 227b4-238b4 bkra shis pa'i dpal s+vasti shrIH bkra shis pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sin+ha dang bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
1 Ggt01.006 ka 238b4-255a7 byang chub kyi sems rtsal chen gyi rgyud bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA pu Sh+Ta tan+t+ra rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrU sing+ha sang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'i
31 Ggt01.007 ka 255a7-259b5 byang chub sems bsgom pa b+ho d+hi tsit+ta sa mA d+hi rdzogs so
69 Ggt01.008 ka 259b5-265a7 byang chub sems rdo rje 'od phro ba'i rgyud kyi rim pa zhes bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta badzra pra b+ha tan+t+ra nA ma rgyud kyi rgyal po mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan rje btsan dam pa rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i rgyud rdzogs so
3 Ggt01.009 ka 265a8-268b1 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa'i yi ge med pa'i rgyud
rdzogs so// //bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa na dang/ rgya nag gi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+has bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
1119 Ggt01.010 ka 268b1-268b8 rje btsan dam pa tsa ra sha ar+thA rdzogs so
164 Ggt01.011 ka 268b8-271b5
byang chub kyi sems mi 'gyur ba'i thig le tig rgzogs so
7 Ggt01.012 ka 271b5-272b7 srog gi 'khor lo a yo tsa kra srog gi 'khor lo rdzogs so
5 Ggt01.013 ka 272b7-274b6
byang chub sems nam mkha'i rgyal po rdzogs so
6 Ggt01.014 ka 274b6-280b7
byang chub sems rtse mo byung rgyal zhes bya ba bsam gtan rdzogs so
165 Ggt01.015 ka 280b7-282b8 bde 'jam many+dzu su kha bde 'jam rdzogs so
9 Ggt01.016 ka 283a1-284a6 bde ba phra bkod su kha pra ka te byang chub sems bde ba phra bkod pa rdzogs so
166 Ggt01.017 ka 284a6-285a5 kun 'dus sarba a ta byang chub kyi sems kun 'dus rdzogs so
167 Ggt01.018 ka 285a5-286a8
gnams spar 'debs rdzogs so
8 Ggt01.019 ka 286b1-289b1 byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i myu gu bo d+hi tsit+ta su kha bin du he tsi byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i myu gu rdzogs so
168 Ggt01.020 ka 289b1-290a2
rdzogs pa spyi gcod ces bya ba rdzogs so
1131 Ggt01.021 ka 290a2-290a8
byang chub kyi sems khams gsum sgron ma rdzogs so
52 Ggt01.022 ka 290b1-300b8 byang chub sems bsgom pa'i rgyud bo d+hi tsit+ta a bA ya tan+t+ra byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud theg pa'i snying po rdzogs so
406 Ggt01.023 ka 300b8-308a4 chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yi de med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harmA/ ma hA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la tshe da A kA sha san+ta tan+t+ra rdzogs so// //bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
26 Ggt01.024 ka 308a4-317a1 chos thams cad byang chub kis sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa rnyog ma med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harmA/ ma hA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la tshe d+ha sa mu sa man+ta b+hi la tan+t+ra rdzogs so// //rgya gar gi mkhan po shri sing ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
27 Ggt01.025 ka 317a1-322b8 chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa nyi zla dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harmaH ma hA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mu la ts+tshed da sU r+ya tsan+d+ra sa ma ta a ma la tan+t+ra rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
29 Ggt01.026 ka 323a1-331b1 chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nad gcod pa rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harmaH ma hA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mu la ts+tshe da ma ha rat+na sa man+ta a bud pa to tan+t+ra rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhhan po shrI sing ha dang/ bos kyi lo ts+tsha bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o// /snga 'gyur lnga dang phyi 'gyur bcu gsum gyi rgyud la rnyi ba'i ban chung nyi ma rdo rjes byas pa
66 Ggt01.027 ka 331b1-357a8 ye shes gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud dz+nyA na gu h+ya nA ma tan+t+ra rdzogs s+ho// //san+d+hi ma hA gu h+ya na ma tan+t+ra/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing ha fang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba pa gor bai ro tsa nas/ yul d+ha he na'i 'dus khang du sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
67 Ggt01.028 ka 357a8-369b4 byang chub kyi sems ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud ces bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta a ti dz+nyA na san+d+hi tan+t+ra nA ma rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha sang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas d+ha he na'i 'du khang du bsgyur ba'o
64 Ggt01.029 ka 369b4-380a7 ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyud ces bya ba dz+nyA na gu h+ya ri bu ma rat+na u pa de sha tan+t+ra bA ma ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //paN Ti ta shri sing+ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas man ngag gi rgyud gtan la phab pa'o
62 Ggt01.030 ka 380a7-391a8 rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rat+na A r+ya pa tha da ri tan+t+ra nA ma rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta shrI sing ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
63 Ggt02.001 kha 1b1-116a1 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po badzra sat+va kha sa mAn+ta ma hA tan+t+ra nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la pha pa'o/ /gzhung tshad bam po bcu gcig pa'o
63 Ggt02.002 kha 116a1-163b8 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po badzra sat+va kha sa mAn+ta ma hA tan+t+ra byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so// //kha sa mAn+ta chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas d+ha he na'i 'du khang du bgyur ro
51 Ggt02.003 kha 163b8-173a2 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che gsang ba'i snying po rnal ma don gyi rgyud badzra gu h+ya gar+b+ha sa t+va ma hA kha b+h+yer+tha tan+t+ra rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che snying po rnal ma don gyi rgyud rdzogs so
1118 Ggt02.004 kha 173a2-201b4 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che kun tu bzang po gsang ba snying po'i rgyud badzra sat+va kha sya mahA/ sa man+ta b+ha dra gu h+ya gar+b+ha tan+t+ra rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
1120 Ggt02.005 kha 201b4-212a5 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che bram ze rgyas pa'i rgyud badzra sat+va sa ya khe ma hA de ha puSh+TiM ga ra tan+t+ra bram ze rgyas pa rdzogs so
171 Ggt02.006 kha 212a5-228a2 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud
rdzogs s+ho
40 Ggt02.007 kha 228a2-250a8 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud badzra sa t+va ma hA A ka sha puSh+Ta nA ma yo gi nI tan+t+ra rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa/ phyis skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos pa'o
172 Ggt02.008 kha 250a8-254a6 byang chub sems bsgom pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud
rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang/ bos kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur pa'o page 273 !
48 Ggt02.009 kha 254a6-271b2 byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i rgyud bo d+hi tsit+ta ra tsa nu ha tan+t+ra rdzogs s+ho// //byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba' phyi ma ta ma nyid dang gsum bzhugs pa las/ zab mo bu ti'i lha khang du bu gnyis lus so/ /slob dpon bu d+d+ha kup+tas snums bar bzhengs nas/ lan gcig gzigs pas/ gnod sbyin kha rtsal gyi 'graxxx du thal lcag gcig rgyab nas brgyal bar gyur to/ brgyal sangs pa dang/ srin po lta bu'i tshul du 'dug pas smras pa/ gnas khang rgyal par gyur pa 'di nyid lyo rgyal po ,e 'od khyod kyi me khyer ro/ /gal te khyer na khyod nyid bsad par bya/ zhes smras pas/ bred nas dngangs nas/ ma ni gong du spyan gzhan zhig tu drangs/ bu gnyis der lus so/ /gang de nyid rnam par 'grel ba la/ /dgos don gsal 'tshad don la 'char ba ni/ /ma bu gsum nas drangs nas gtan la phab/ /phyi nas blo'i zer las skyod nas bya bzod na/ 'phags thugs 'gal dang 'phral du gnod sbyin mos/ /bar chad byed phyir blo'i gzer la skyod/ /las stod mkhas pa mgon po la/ myang stod lce nag bdud rstis zhus
1121 Ggt02.010 kha 271b2-304b7 bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i le'u ma hA su kha/ bo d+hi tsit+ta so pa shi ka rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha sang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
48 Ggt02.011 kha 305a1-332b2 byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba bo d+hi tsit+ta so pa shi ka rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang/ lo tsa ba gnyags dz+nyA na ku ma ras bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa'o// //shrI sing+ha sang/ bai ro tsa nas sngar yang bsgyur
65 Ggt02.012 kha 332b4-337a7 rin po che 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud rat+na tsakra nA ma tan tra rin po che 'khor lo'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho
157 Ggt02.013 kha 337a7-338a8 ye shes 'khor lo'i rgyud dz+nyA na tsa kra tan tra rdzogs s+ho//
173 Ggt03.001 ga 1b1-11b7 rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud san+ti ma hA dz+nyA na gu h+ya tan tra rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //bu la gtad do pha'i btsas/ /snod med rnams ka shor rar/ /rdzogs pa chen po klong dgu bam po 'bum sde las/ 'di las zab pa mi bzhugs so/ /rdo rje mkha'gros bsrungs shig /sa maa ya/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing ha sang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba A tsar+ya bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gta nla phab'o
174 Ggt03.002 ga 11b7-25b8 byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gsang ba bshad pa'i rgyud gsal ba mtha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta ma sA san d+hi dz+nyA na gu h+ya shI tan tra pra ka sa ko d+hi sa ma d+ha nA ma
175 Ggt03.003 ga 26a1-38b8 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rtsa ba'i rgyud skye ba med pa badzra kha sa mU la a rdzogs so
176 Ggt03.004 ga 38b8-58b6 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyal po rgyas pa'i rgyud badzra sat+va/ kha se ma hA rA dza puSh+TiM tan+t+ra
177 Ggt03.005 ga 58b6-68b8 rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che'i rgyud ces bya ba badzra sat+va ga ga sems hA tan+t+ra nA ma rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che'i rgyud rdzogs so
178 Ggt03.006 ga 69a1-122b6 byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po mkha' mnyam klong gi rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA san+d+hi kha sa me a lang+ka ra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
179 Ggt03.007 ga 122b6-124b4 ye shes mdzod chen chos kyi dbyings dz+nyA na ma hA ko Sha e d+harma rdzogs s+ho
180 Ggt03.008 ga 124b4-126a8 ye shes gsang chos kyi dbyings dz+nyA na pra ka sa e d+harma
181 Ggt03.009 ga 126b1-127b3 ye shes 'bar ba chos kyi dbyings dz+nyA dz+va la e d+harma d+hA tu
182 Ggt03.010 ga 127b3-129a4 ye shes sa gcig chos kyi dbyings dz+nyA d+harma e d+harma d+hA tu rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhas pa shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur pa'o
183 Ggt03.011 ga 129a4-144b8 byang chub kyi sems kyi rgya mtsho klong dgu'i rgyud ces bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta a lang+ka ra a man+ta b+ha ba nA ma rdzogs s+ho
184 Ggt03.012 ga 144b8-152b2 byang chub sems kun 'dus 'od kyi rgyud ces bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta bin d+ha pra b+ha ni tan+t+ra nA ma byang chub sems kun 'dus 'od kyi tan+t+ra rdzogs so
185 Ggt03.013 ga 152b2-163b8 ye shes rin chen 'od kyi rgyud ces bya ba dz+nyA na pra b+ha rat+na tan+t+ra nA ma rin po che 'od kyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing ha dang/ lo tsa ba bai ro tsa nas d+ha he na'i du khang du bsgyur ba'o
186 Ggt03.014 ga 164a1-182b7 byang chub sems nya mo 'khor lo'i rgyud bo d+hi tsit+ta ping ta ki tsakra tan tra
187 Ggt03.015 ga 182b7-198b7 yi ge 'bru bshad las kyi 'khor lo dun te mi le karma tsakra
188 Ggt03.016 ga 199a1-201b1
byang chub kyi sems thig pa nya mo bgal nyal rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur pa'o
189 Ggt03.017 ga 201b1-206a6 rig pa nam mkha' ltar gsal ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud tsit+ta pas mo g+ha bod d+ha ye nA ma rig pa nam mkha' ltar gsal ba'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya'o
190 Ggt03.018 ga 206a6-230b8 thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo skye ba med pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud sarba kha k+Sha a ba yan bo d+hi tsit+ta tan tra
191 Ggt03.019 ga 230b8-234a1
byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho
192 Ggt03.020 ga 234a1-236b4 de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rgyud/ rnal 'byor dam pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar giy mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+bha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phabs pa'o
193 Ggt03.021 ga 236b4-239a2
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs las byung ba mthong bar dka' ba'i don rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ skad gsar pas kyang bsabs pa'o
31 Ggt03.022 ga 239a2-241b6 byang chub sems bsgom pa bod+hi tsit+ta rdzogs s+ho
194 Ggt03.023 ga 241b6-251b3 rdzogs pa chen po lta ba dmar 'byam lta ba'i rgyud san+d+hi ma hA pra ka ra tan+t+ra nA ma
406 Ggt03.024 ga 251b3-259b8 chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ye shes 'od kyi rgyud sarba d+harma ma hA san d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sA ra mU la tshe da ma hA A kA sha sa man+ta dz+nyA na pra b+ha tan+t+ra nam mkha' dang myanm pa ye shes 'od kyi rgyud rdzogs so
196 Ggt03.025 ga 259b8-332a3 chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba sarba d+harma san ta k+Sha pa rA na tan tra ma hA na ma ma hA a ti yo ga g+hu h+ya pra de sha/ kha sa man ta na ma kha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal seng ge'i 'od can gyi zhal lda nas dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong gan jag rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal gzigs pa des/ yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du/ bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
197 Ggt03.026 ga 332a3-353a8 byang chub kyi sems nam mkha' rgya mtsho rdzogs pa chen po gsang ba rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta kha ma se ta a kam ka ra san ti ma hA gu h+ya tan tra ra dza nA ma byang chub kyi sems/ rdzogs pa chen po/ klong chen rab 'byams/ rgyal ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ nam mkha' rgya mtsho rol pa chen po'i snang ba chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho
60 Ggt04.001 nga 1b1-11b8 byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po rig pa rang rtsal shar ba'i rgyud ces bya ba bo d+hi tsit+ta b+ha dra da na bi d+ya tra ni tsa ni pra tan+t+ra nA ma rdzogs so
33 Ggt04.002 nga 11b8-22b7 byang chub sems rdzogs pa chen po ye shes bdun gyi rgyud bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA san+d+hi dz+nyA nA tan+t+ra rdzogs s+ho
59 Ggt04.003 nga 22b7-36a8 kun tu bzang po nam mkha' chen rtsa ba bsdus pa'i rgyud mA la pu tra sya ra kha sya mahA tan+t+ra kun tu bzang po nam mkha' che/ rtsa ba bsdus pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// //dga' rab rdo rje ka zhus pa'o/ /man ngag rtsa ba bsdus pa'i rygud/ chos nyid mi 'gyur rgyas btab gzhag/ ban chung 'khyams po bdag gis drangs/ /bod nas rgya gar yul gyi bar/ /bka' ba bc+vo rgyas spyad pa las/ /de'i shi lnga bcu rtsa bzhi byung/ /man ngag rgyal po'i phyag du gdams/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bdag gis drangs/ bod kyi ban+d+he bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
158 Ggt04.004 nga 36b1-47b8 rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs rgyud zhes bya ba san+ti ma hA dz+nyA na tsakra gu h+ya tsit+ta tan+t+ra nA ma rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho
198 Ggt04.005 nga 47b8-63a4 srog gi 'byung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba h+ri da yo da ya ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza ma hA nA ma srog gi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po gzhon nu bum pa'i zhabs kyis bsgyur ba'o// //
44 Ggt04.006 nga 63a4-78b8 rma bya mjing bsnol gyi rgyud las/ 'bras bu bla na med pa'i theg pa kring kring ra tsa sa da na tan+t+ra bo d+hi tsit+ta d+harma na ma byang chub kyi sems dpa' rma bya ma mjing bsnol zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ 'jam dpal snying pos byang chub sems dpa' ro langs bde va'i theg pa la gdams rdzogs s+ho
1124 Ggt04.007 nga 78b8-84b7 byang chub kyi sems rma bya mjing bsnol gyir rgyud las/ mtha'i mun sel chen po zhes bya ba bo d+hi sa t+va dz+nyA na gar+b+ha kring ra tsa tan+t+ra su tra a rgyud dag pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po dang/ sbrul ba'i sangs rgyas re res mdzad pa so so'i/ don bstan pa'o rdzogs so
485 Ggt04.008 nga 85a1-105b4 lta ba thams cad kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud d+he ka sarba radza sa man ta b+ha dra ang ma b+hur pa tan tra lta ba thams cad kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud chen po rdzogs s+ho
489 Ggt04.009 nga 105b4-119a8 spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud
spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud gsung ba med pa'i mdzod/ sems kyi 'bras bu'i mchog rdzogs s+ho// //sa skya'i rgyud las skyar zhus dag
488 Ggt04.010 nga 119b1-134b1 phrin las thams cad kyi rgyal po skabs sbyor bdun pa'i rgyud sa tsa karma sarba rA dza tan tra rdzogs s+ho
487 Ggt04.011 nga 134b1-147a8 rgyud kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyud ces bya ba sa mA d+h+ya gra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma rdzogs s+ho
200 Ggt04.012 nga 147b1-178b3 dam tshig chen po'i rgyal po dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud ma hA sa ma ya rA tsa sarba ka ta tan tra dam tshigs thams cad kyi rgyal po sa ma ya bkod pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho
486 Ggt04.013 nga 178b3-198b4 dbang gi rgyal po dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud pad+ma rA dza a b+hi Shany+tsi rA dza asti tan tra rdzogs s+ho
